posts.post_content:
All,
 
Looking to sell a few raw cards.  Please include $2 shipping for 1 or 2 cards.....if buying 3 or more, shipping is on me. Payment via PP F&F if possible.
 
And as always, will definitely entertain offers, especially if buying more than 1. Of course anyone saying "I'll take it" gets priority over any ongoing negotiations.
 
 
 - still not sure I want to sell him ;)
$SOLD McGraw portrait with cap
$SOLD Kleinow Boston Rarity Polar Bear
$SOLD Elberfeld NY portrait - has a crease from top middle to the right middle.
$SOLD Frank Delehanty
$SOLD Nattress
$SOLD Jennings 2 hands
